message.content: {"id": "18705", "title": "Too much flashing in Control Example", "description": "When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, it is noticed that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively.", "OB": "All tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames flash excessively when resizing the window in the vertical direction in the control example.", "EB": "The flashing issue in the Control Example needs to be investigated and resolved.", "SR": "Investigate and fix the flashing issue in the Control Example by making sure that tabs in the TabFolder and Frames do not flash excessively when resizing the window in the vertical direction."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
